name: Backcountry Flying Experience
about: Backcountry Flying Experience, located in Montana's Flathead Valley, offers unparalleled flight training and scenic aerial tours. Our expert instructors, with hundreds to thousands of hours of float and tailwheel experience, provide top-notch training in floatplane, tailwheel, and backcountry flying. Students can earn seaplane ratings and advanced floatplane certifications in the stunning landscapes of Glacier Country, including big lake water, mountain lakes, and numerous rivers. Our training programs are tailored to each pilot's skill set, ensuring a safe and exhilarating learning experience. Whether you're seeking to fly into remote wilderness areas or enjoy scenic tours over Northwestern Montana, we offer the best in backcountry flying instruction and adventure. Join us to explore the breathtaking beauty of Montana from the skies.
